level.text: Within the W-0 District, for any building or structure located in whole or in part on land, the minimum width of each side yard shall be twelve (12) feet.
No side yard shall be required in the W-1, W-2, and W-3 Districts. If a side yard is provided, its minimum width shall be at least eight (8) feet.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: ยง 4406.3 of the Zoning Regulations, effective May 12, 1958; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 3440 (April 2, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 6358 (July 8, 2005).
